subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Hawks rolled past the top-seeded Indiana Pacers, 101-93, on Saturday night, ending an eight-game road losing streak in the playoffs that dated to May 2011.
snippet: The Hawks rolled past the top-seeded Indiana Pacers, 101-93, on Saturday night, ending an eight-game road losing streak in the playoffs that dated to May 2011.
